sentences.sContent: He fell under suspicion for distributing seditious pamphlets.
sentences.sCn: 他因分发反政府传单而受到怀疑。

synos.tran: 煽动性的；扰乱治安的；参与煽动的

words.tran: 暴动；煽动性的言论或行为；妨害治安

trans.tranCn: 煽动性的；扰乱治安的；参与煽动的
trans.tranOther: A seditious act, speech, or piece of writing encourages people to fight against or oppose the government
